subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Charles Howell shot a five-under-par 67 to take a one-shot lead into the final round of the AT&T Classic. He dropped to 13 under after 54 holes at T.P.C. Sugarloaf in Duluth, Ga. Kenny Perry shot a 69 and is alone in second. Jonathan Byrd, who led by three strokes entering the round, shot a 73 and was two shots back.
